flavor.pie.bungeelib

Class BungeeLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • flavor.pie.bungeelib.BungeeLib

  • public class BungeeLib
extends Object
    The library class for BungeeLib.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BungeeLib.NoPlayerOnlineException
      This API operates via plugin message packets, and therefore requires there to be at least one player on the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BungeeLib(PluginContainer container)
      Constructs a new library instance for your plugin.

      • connectPlayer

        public void connectPlayer(Player p,
                          String server)
        Connects a player on this server to another server.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to connect
        server - The server to send them to
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the GameState is not GameState.SERVER_STARTED

      • connectPlayer

        public void connectPlayer(String player,
                          String server)
        Connects a player from any server to any other server.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to connect
        server - The server to send them to
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the GameState is not GameState.SERVER_STARTED
        BungeeLib.NoPlayerOnlineException - If there is no player online

      • getPlayerIP

        public CompletableFuture<InetSocketAddress> getPlayerIP(Player player)
        Gets the real InetSocketAddress of a player.

        Do not call the returned CompletableFuture immediately, or the entire server will hang.

        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the address of
        Returns:
        A future which returns the address.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the GameState is not GameState.SERVER_STARTED

      • getPlayerCount

        public CompletableFuture<Integer> getPlayerCount(String server)
        Gets the number of players on a given server.

        Do not call the returned CompletableFuture immediately, or the entire server will hang.

        Parameters:
        server - The server to query
        Returns:
        A future which returns the count
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the GameState is not GameState.SERVER_STARTED
        BungeeLib.NoPlayerOnlineException - If there is no player online

      • getGlobalPlayerCount

        public CompletableFuture<Integer> getGlobalPlayerCount()
        Gets the number of players on all servers.

        Do not call the returned CompletableFuture immediately, or the entire server will hang.

        Returns:
        A future which returns the count
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the GameState is not GameState.SERVER_STARTED
        BungeeLib.NoPlayerOnlineException - If there is no player online

        Returns:

        BungeeLib.NoPlayerOnlineException - If there is no player online
